level.text: The Director shall make the final selection of the grant award.
Based on his or her review, the Director shall do one (1) of the following:
Approve the application, in whole or in part, for such amount of funds and subject to such conditions as he or she considers necessary or desirable for the completion of the approved project;
Defer action on the application for reasons such as lack of funds or a need for further review, or any other reason.
A Grant Officer appointed by the Director shall notify the awardee in writing of the Director’s decision.
The Director’s decision is final and shall not be appealed.
